vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Φανουήλ, ὁ indecl. (Heb. פְּנוּאֵל),
Phanuel: Luk.2:36.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Luk.2.36;
father of: Anna (G0451)
§ Phanuel, "face of God [El]"
Phanuel, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 2:36*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
法內利 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "神的面"
亞設支派女先知亞拿的父親 (路 2:36)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
法内利 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "神的面"
亚设支派女先知亚拿的父亲 (路 2:36)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Pha-nu-ên, cha của bà tiên tri An-ne. Xem H6439.
